LanguageData.NCCM.SettingsCategory.Label: Replace Context Menu
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.NormalSettings.Tab.Label: Normal
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.AdvancedSettings.Tab.Label: Advanced
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.AskBeforeReplace.Label: Ask before replace
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.AskBeforeReplace.Tooltip: After enabling this option, you will be asked whether to replace the menu when replacing the menu.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.ReplaceUnknownSource.Label: Replace unknown source
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.ReplaceUnknownSource.Toolt: After enabling this option, menus whose sources cannot be determined will be directly replaced.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.CloseOnClickOutSide.Label: Close menu on click outside
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.CloseOnClickOutSide.Toolti: After enabling this option, clicking outside the menu will close it.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.FocusSearchBar.Label: Auto focus search bar
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.FocusSearchBar.Tooltip: After enabling this option, the focus will be automatically set to the search bar when the menu is opened.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.HasMemory.Label: Menu has memory
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.HasMemory.Tooltip: After enabling this option, the menu will remember its position and size when the window is closed.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.IsDragable.Label: Menu is draggable
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.IsDragable.Tooltip: After enabling this option, the menu can be dragged.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.IsResizable.Label: Menu is resizable
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.IsResizable.Tooltip: After enabling this option, a corner will be displayed at the bottom right of the menu for resizing.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.MinimumOptionCountCauseRep: When the number of options in the menu is greater than this number, we will replace the vanilla menu.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.PauseGame.Label: Menu pause game
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.PauseGame.Tooltip: After enabling this option, the game will be paused when the menu is opened.
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.UseVanillaRenderMode.Label: Whether to use vanilla render mode
LanguageData.NCCM.Settings.UseVanillaRenderMode.Toolt: Enable this option to improve compatibility when encountering errors caused by this mod.
LanguageData.NCCN.ConfirmReplaceFloatMenu.Text: A replaceable menu has been found.\n\nWould you like to replace it?
LanguageData.NCCM.AdvancedSettings.Category.BlackList: Menus created by the following methods will not be replaced.
LanguageData.NCCM.AdvancedSettings.Category.WhiteList: Menus created by the following methods will be replaced.
LanguageData.NCCM.ReplaceSettings.Entry.Tooltip: The full name of the method for creating a menu.
